ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
$=JSON.parse(result);
list=[];
if($.Success){
vol=$.Volumes;
for(i in vol){
   //å·
     list.push({
            Volume_name:vol[i].Volume_name,
            Chapter_id  :vol[i].Volume_id
           })
   //ç« èŠ‚
     for(j in vol[i].Chapters){
           c=vol[i].Chapters[j];
          list.push({
             Chapter_name:c.Chapter_name,
             //Chapter_name:c.Chapter_name,
            Chapter_id:c.Chapter_id
          })
      }
}
}else{l=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(java.get('url'))).select('.chapter').toArray();
for(i in l){
list.push({Chapter_name:String(l[i].text()),Chapter_id:String(l[i].select('a').attr('href')).match(/\d+\/(.*?)\.html$/)[1]})
}list.push({Chapter_name:'ç™»å½•åæŸ¥çœ‹å®Œæ•´å·/ç« èŠ‚åˆ—è¡¨'})
}
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{
n:".works-intro-title strong@text",
a:".works-intro-digi em.0@text",
k:".works-status li.0@text&&id.coll_count.3@text&&.works-chapter-log span.1@text",
w:".works-status li.5@text",
l:".works-ft-new a@text",
i:".works-intro-short@html",
tags:".tags-show a@text",
c:".works-cover img@src",
u:""
}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}
ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}

loginUrl:
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
une=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·")
pwd=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ")

if(une&&pwd) {
  let url = 'https://source.yidm.com/login.php?uname='+une+'&pass='+pwd+'&emailCode=&invite=&appToken=936e865324660e3714bad0de645d08d1.43710661fe6fc6e76840fa2a7abbd0a6&type=pc'
  $ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  headers = {'token':'token='+$.token}
  headers = JSON.stringify(headers)
  source.putLoginHeader(headers)
}
